contentBlock.content: This manual presents a description of the operation, possibilities and control functions of the central ARGOS M1 climate and management computer.

contentBlock.contetnt:
**ARGOS structure**
 ARGOS M1 is a central operation unit connected, via a communication port, to room computers (ARGOS M2/M3). Each of these room computers has independent intelligence with control technique.Maximum 35 room computers can be to ARGOS M1

contentBlock.content:
In asimple way, reuired setting and measurements for the connected rooms and centeral contrls(e.g. centeral exhaust) can be retrived and/or entered. The following data can be retrived and/or entered:
+Reading and settings of the conneted rooms and/or centeral controls
+Curve Controls.
+water consumption registration per room.
Automatic lighting contro.
+Historical overview in the form of graphs.
+Alarms.
**ARGOS M1 Blackbox**
There is also an ARGOS M1 blackbox.IN this case, operation of ARGOS M! take Place via PC,laptop,table or smartphone.In this case the ARGOS PC connect license is required.
**ARGOS connect PC program**
ARGOS can be connectd directly to a PC via a router.

contetblock.content:
If you want to log in under a different user, you must press at the bottom right.
 A new Window will be displayed in which the user, depending on the setting standard authentication mode, is offered several options. they are described below :++Standard authentication mode: Basic++
